'''''Vinyar Tengwar 49''''' is the forty-ninth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|48|50}}

==Contents==
* "''Eldarin Hands, Fingers & Numerals'' and Related Writings, Part three"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Patrick H. Wynne
* "Five Late Quenya Volitive Inscriptions"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, ed. Carl F. Hostetter

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
